ygData.subject: RE: Invisibility against undead (was End of Kiting?)
ygData.msgSnippet: many mobs have the innate ability to see invis without having a spell cast on them.  one example is the kobolds in solusek B.  invis is uselss against them.
ygData.messageBody:
many mobs have the innate ability to see invis without having a spell cast
on them. one example is the kobolds in solusek B. invis is uselss against
them.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> These leads into another question, John stated that sometimes
> the hag casts
> See Invisibility on the mobs and thats why they still attack
> you when you
> sing the song. What about other types of mobs? Do any
> creatures out there
> have the innate ability to See Invisibility or do they have
> to also cast the
> See Invisibility spell?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
